system.descriptionText:
Character can use Order when one or more Player Characters have been Surpised. All Comrades affected spend a Half Action to benefit from cover as if receiving the Take Cover! Generic Order, even if their controlling Player Characters cannot act due to being Suprised.
Take Cover!: All shots that hit the Comrade must roll damage, if doing less than 3+Cover AP damage, the Comrade is unharmed.
